item.description:
Life can be challenging at times. How can you remain balanced, happy and content despite the difficulties, uncertainties and anxiety of challenging economic times, relationship and personal crises? We'll look at how to turn anxiety into self connection, how to focus on the positive, how to get support and how to creativity focus on solutions.

Workshop ends at 10pm. Optional macrobiotic vegetarian delicious meal with dessert for $20 additional at 7pm. Need 1 day advance notice.

Herb Pearce has been a life coach and therapist for over 30 years and is the author of Herb's Tips for Living, a book of wise tips for daily living. He is also the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and has taught over 5000 workshops on personality types, communication skills, spirituality and living a full life.

www.herbpearce.com
